name: prayerful
content:

saying prayers or involving prayers: He combines a brilliant mind, a prayerful life, and great political wisdom. They described the three-hour meeting as powerful and prayerful.
like a prayer: The service was a combination of traditional prayer and prayerful New Orleans jazz. Supporters chanted his name with a force that was almost prayerful.
More examplesFewer examplesWhen people are happy, they sometimes forget to be prayerful. He pressed his hands together in an almost prayerful way before replying.
